sentences.en: A fleeting glimpse of eternity, and in a flash , they are gone.
sentences.cn: 虽然只是一闪而过, 却拥有短暂的永恒.

sentences.en: a fleeting smile
sentences.cn: 一闪即逝的微笑

sentences.en: Art is long , and time is fleeting.
sentences.cn: 时光飞逝, 学艺无穷.

sentences.en: Carol was paying a fleeting visit to Paris.
sentences.cn: 卡罗尔在巴黎短暂停留。

sentences.en: Excitement will be easy to find, but satisfaction will be fleeting.
sentences.cn: 人们将发现:找刺激容易, 要满意却不易!

sentences.en: For a fleeting moment I thought the car was going to crash.
sentences.cn: 刹那间我想到汽车要碰撞.

sentences.en: For one fleeting moment , Paula allowed herself to forget her troubles.
sentences.cn: 就在这一片刻，葆拉让自己暂时忘却了烦恼。

sentences.en: I caught a fleeting glimpse of them as they drove past.
sentences.cn: 我瞥见他们驱车一闪而过。

sentences.en: I got only a fleeting glimpse of him.
sentences.cn: 我只是瞬间看到他一眼.

sentences.en: I watched, smiling, knowing how fleeting these moments when they are small are.
sentences.cn: 我微笑的看着这一切，我知道这个时刻是多么的短暂。

sentences.en: Knowing the life fleeting , she set herself to enjoy if as best as she could.
sentences.cn: 她知道这种日子转瞬即逝, 于是让自已尽情地享受.

sentences.en: Most touches were only about five seconds, but in these fleeting moments, we’re capable of communicating distinct emotions, just as we are with the face.
sentences.cn: 大部分触摸只有五秒左右，然而就是在这么短暂的时间里，我们有能力传达明确的情绪，正像我们通过表情所做的那样。

sentences.en: Our opportunities to obey God's promptings are also fleeting.
sentences.cn: 我们遵行上帝指示的机会同样也是稍纵即逝.

sentences.en: Sharp , fleeting sensations are not typical of angina.
sentences.cn: 一闪而过的锐痛并非典型的心绞痛.

sentences.en: She wondered for a fleeting moment if he would put his arm around her.
sentences.cn: 他会不会搂住自己，这个念头在她脑子里一闪而过。

sentences.en: The girls caught only a fleeting glimpse of the driver.
sentences.cn: 女孩们只匆匆瞥了一眼司机。

sentences.en: The movement was characterized by its concern with fleeting effects of light and its motion.
sentences.cn: 这一运动的特色是关心光及其变动的瞬间效果.

sentences.en: The very best we could hope for was one fleeting glimpse of it through the undergrowth.
sentences.cn: 我们最多也就是指望能透过下层林丛在刹那间看到它一眼.

sentences.en: The world is like a fleeting show.
sentences.cn: 人世如白驹过隙.

sentences.en: This happens in nearly every recession, and the effect is usually fleeting.
sentences.cn: 这发生在几乎所有的经济衰退, 并影响通常是短暂的.

sentences.en: Time is fleeting.; Time flies.
sentences.cn: 时光飞逝。

sentences.en: Wealth and power can be fleeting, family bonds tenuous , status mercurial.
sentences.cn: 财富权力转眼成空, 家庭关系淡薄如纸, 名望地位飘忽不定.

phrases.tran_cn: 佛里特街（英国几家报馆办事处所在地）；伦敦报业；伦敦新闻界

trans.tran_cn: 疾驰的，飞逝的，短暂的，稍纵即逝，翩
trans.tran_en: lasting for only a short time
